title: When Your Money Habits Clash
itunes:author: Guests: Chuck & Ann Bentley
itunes:summary:
Money. It's one of the most common reasons couples fight. To help ease financial tension, John and Erin will share a helpful key for when you're frustrated with your spouse's financial choices. Featuring Mr. Chuck and Mrs. Ann Bentley.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Chuck and Ann Bentley's book "Money Problems, Marriage Solutions" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2021-11-30?refcd=1181701

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/when-your-money-habits-clash/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
